title: Ada Ichoja Ohaba
text:
Ada Ichoja Ohaba is a seasoned social worker and development expert with over 14 years of experience in peacebuilding, conflict transformation, gender equality, and human capacity development. Throughout her career, she has led impactful projects across Nigeria, focusing on areas such as organizational strengthening, early warning systems, gender mainstreaming, and safeguarding.
Ada holds a Master’s (MSc) and Bachelor’s (BSc) in Social Work, as well as a Diploma in Law (DIL) from the University of Jos, Nigeria. She has held key leadership positions, including Executive Director of Triple Nexus Consult and Country Coordinator for the Do-No-Harm Humanitarian Development Initiative. Additionally, she has provided consulting expertise for reputable organizations such as International Alert, Oxfam, Creative Associates, Avalon Design Konsult, and the Plateau State Peace Building Agency.
Her extensive experience and deep knowledge in stakeholder engagement, advocacy, program management, and policy monitoring make her a strong advocate for gender inclusion and sustainable development. Ada has conducted extensive research and training on conflict sensitivity, gender-based violence, early warning and response systems, and dialogue and mediation, establishing herself as a respected voice in these areas.
Her professional expertise is further complemented by certifications and training in trauma care, policy advocacy, climate change adaptation, and humanitarian development, empowering her to effect positive change in diverse communities across Nigeria.

title: About
text:
At Triple Nexus Consult, we are more than just consultants—we are partners in your journey towards growth and excellence. Our firm specializes in providing a range of services that empower individuals, organizations, and communities. Let us introduce ourselves:



Training Services: We offer tailored training programs designed to enhance skills, knowledge, and performance. Whether you’re an individual seeking personal development or an organization aiming to upskill your workforce, our training solutions are customized to meet your unique needs.
Psychosocial Services: Our team of experts understands the critical intersection of psychology and well-being. We provide compassionate support, counseling, and strategies to promote mental health and resilience.
Advisory Excellence: Strategic decision-making is at the core of success. Our advisory services provide actionable insights, data-driven recommendations, and innovative solutions to drive your business forward.
Project Management Solutions: From inception to execution, we ensure seamless project delivery. Our project management expertise spans diverse sectors, ensuring efficient and effective outcomes.




At Triple Nexus Consult, our mission is clear: - Integration: We integrate psychological insights, strategic guidance, and practical training to create holistic solutions. - Empowerment: We empower individuals, organizations, and communities to thrive. - Sustainability: Our focus on sustainable outcomes ensures lasting impact.




Expertise: Our team comprises seasoned professionals with diverse backgrounds and a passion for excellence.
Client-Centric Approach: Your success is our priority. We listen, collaborate, and tailor our services to your unique context.
Results-Driven: We measure success by the positive impact we create for our clients.

Join us on this transformative journey. Let’s build resilience, optimize performance, and achieve remarkable results together.
